text: Can someone give me some advice? I'm writing an API, in response to a request, I need to call quite a few functions. Where should those functions live? right now they're chilling in routes.jl but it seems wrong to me. Should I make a file in src?

elements.text: Can someone give me some advice? I'm writing an API, in response to a request, I need to call quite a few functions. Where should those functions live? right now they're chilling in routes.jl but it seems wrong to me. Should I make a file in src?

text: I have a script in lib for that I run. I believe in your case you should the functions in a module in lib and then just import or use that module.
